Topic.Title: How can I make my images click to  new section/passage?

Posts.EditableText: As the title says. How can I make an image link to a new section/passage? For example: Click an image to make your decision: [[1]]: you have chosen image 1 [[2]]: you have chosen image 2 [[3]]: you have chosen image 3 Thanks in advance!
Posts.HTML:
As the title says. How can I make an image link to a new section/passage?
For example:
Click an image to make your decision: <img src="1.jpg"/ > <img src="2.jpg"/ > <img src="3.jpg"/ >
[[1]]:
you have chosen image 1
[[2]]:
you have chosen image 2
[[3]]:
you have chosen image 3
Thanks in advance!

Posts.EditableText: Easy. Images act no differently to text in Squiffy. So simply use: [[]](mysectionname)
Posts.HTML:
Easy. Images act no differently to text in Squiffy. So simply use:

[[<img src="1.jpg"/ >]](mysectionname)
